alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 9:53PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Nevada and Columbia Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 953 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Macedonia, or 9 miles southwest of Magnolia, moving north at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Magnolia, Waldo, McNeil, Taylor, Emerson, Rosston, Willisville, Bluff City, Bussey, Smithland, Macedonia, Welcome, White Oak Lake State Park, Calhoun, Mount Vernon, Cale, Laughlin, Waterloo, College Hill and Medlock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for southwestern Arkansas.
